title: Le Foyer
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aim is to support the local production by using all local, Burkinabe, products. Not only the food but also the interior was sourced locally. There are options for vegetarians and vegans such as tofu, a salad, a vegetable stew, tofu-brochette, and traditional bean and lentil dishes like gonre and zamne. Located in the midst of a cultural center and every Friday there is a concert by Burkinab√© artists.
streetAddress: Gounghin, in front of TSR bus station
